room_title: Escape room "The Cabin: Fun House Massacre" by Escape Woods in Atlanta
review: Simple amazing definitely worth the money and drive. I will be back to try something else. Great peopleWe had a blast. All the trash talk made the game even better.

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin: Fun House Massacre" by Escape Woods in Atlanta
review: We went to Escape Woods and did the Fun House and Cabin Escape. It was awesome! So much fun! The employees were great and they made the experience fun and a couple of times we jumped. We solved the puzzles and escaped. I highly recommend this!

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin: Fun House Massacre" by Escape Woods in Atlanta
review: We had A BLAST!! We did the Cabin Funhouse massacre escape woods! Harley was AWESOME getting us scared and entertained! We had a blast! This was our second Escape woods with Sleepy Hallow and both times were great! Highly recommended!!!
